verses.1: Tua ciangin, tokhom tungah a tupa in a taklam khut ah a tawi laizial tawn khat ka mu hi. Tua a laidal tung a lang nih tuakah lai kigelhin a kizial cip khit ciangin a kiphel theih loh nadingin mun sagih ah kiciamteh hi.
verses.2: Tua ciangin a thahat vantungmi khat ka mu a, amah in nakpi takin, “Hih laizial a ciaptehnate la khia-in a laizial a phel dingin a kilawm kua om ahi hiam?” hong ci hi.
verses.3: Ahi zongin tua laizial a phel ding mi, vantung, leitung, leinuai ah kuamah kimu lo hi.
verses.4: Tua laizial phelin a sung a en dingin a kilawm kuamah kimu lo ahih manin nakpi takin ka kap hi.
verses.5: Tua laitakin upate khat in kei kiangah, “Kap kei in. Judah minam sung panin Humpinelkai, David suan sung panin a lianpa gualzo khinta a, tua laizial ciaptehna sagihte la khia-in a laizial phel thei ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
verses.6: Tua upateʼ huam sung, ganhing lite le kumpi tokhom kikalah Tuuno a ding ka mu hi. Tua Tuuno pen a kigo lum sa tawh kibang a, leitung khempeuh ah a kisawl khia, Pasianʼ khateʼ lim ahi ki sagih le mittang sagih a nei hi.
verses.7: Tua Tuuno va pai a, tokhom tungah a tupa in a tak lamah a tawi laizial a va la hi.
verses.8: Tua laizial a lak khit ciangin ganhing lite le upa sawm nih le lite, Topaʼ mai ah a kun uh hi. Amaute in harp lasakna khat ciat le Pasianʼ mi siangthote in thungetna-in a zat uh paknamtui a dimin a om paknamtui beel khat ciat a tawi uh hi.
verses.9: Amaute in la thak khat sa uh a, “Nang Tuuno, tua laizial a la khia ding le a ciaptehnate a la khia dingin na kilawm hi. Nang hong kigo khin ahih manin mi namkim le pau namkim a pau mite sung panin na sisan tawh Pasian adingin mite na lei khin a,
verses.10: Pasianʼ na a sem dingin siampi za le kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh tokhom le ganhing lite le upateʼ kimkot ah atul-amakin a ding miaimuai vantung miteʼ awging ka za hi.
verses.12: Amaute in nakpi takin la sa uh a, “A kigo Tuuno in vangliatna le hauhna, pilna le thahatna, pahtawina, minthanna le phatna, a ngah dingin kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung le mun khempeuh ah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh in la a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, “Tokhom tungah a tupa le Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthanna le vangliatna, ngah tawntung tahen,” a ci uh hi.
verses.14: Tua ciangin ganhing lite in zong, “Amen,” na ci uh a, upate in zong khukdinin Pasian a bia uh hi.
